title: Spatial capture-recapture models in R
description: This is a free, open source course on fitting, visualizing, understanding, and predicting from spatial(ly explicit) capture-recapture models. The idea is to use the material in this course either as part of a facilitated workshoo, or in independent study. Funded by an EPSRC grant.
